titles.title: National Historical Park and National Historic Landmark Establishment and Boundary Adjustments Act of 2025
National Historical Park and National Historic Landmark Establishment and Boundary Adjustments Act of 2025
A bill to establish the Fort Ontario Holocaust Refugee Shelter National Historical Park, to designate the America's National Churchill Museum National Historic Landmark, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
